mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ROLE NOT IN ('STUDENT')

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, NVL(L.LECTURE_NAME, '수업X') AS LECTURE_NAME, M.PHONE, NVL( ROUND( (SUM(CASE WHEN C.COMMUTE_STATUS IN ('출근', '퇴근', '지각', '반차') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(C.COMMUTE_NO), 0)) * 100, 2), 0) AS COMMUTE_RATE, CASE WHEN M.ROLE = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' ELSE '강사' END AS ROLE, CASE WHEN M.STATUS = 'Y' THEN '재직' ELSE '퇴사' END AS STATUS, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS COMMUTE_MONTH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN LECTURE L ON M.MEMBER_NO = L.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN COMMUTE C ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND TRUNC(C.COMMUTE_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') WHERE M.ROLE NOT IN ('STUDENT') GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, L.LECTURE_NAME, M.PHONE, M.ROLE, M.STATUS ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NAME

SELECT C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_NO FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON C.CLASS_NO = CL.CLASS_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON CL.LECTURE_NO = L.LECTURE_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(LC.PLAN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND L.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_NO, C.MEMBER_COUNT, LC.CONTROLL_NO FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_LECTURE CL ON C.CLASS_NO = CL.CLASS_NO JOIN LECTURE_CONTROL LC ON CL.CLASS_LECTURE_NO = LC.CLASS_LECTURE_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, CS.STUDENT_NO, C.CLASS_NAME, A.ATTEND_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN CLASS_STUDENT CS ON M.MEMBER_NO = CS.MEMBER_NO JOIN CLASS C ON CS.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTEND A ON A.STUDENT_NO = CS.STUDENT_NO AND TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTEND( ATTEND_NO, ATTEND_STATUS, SESSION_NO, STUDENT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{attendStatus}, #{sessionNo}, #{studentNo} )
